means: 将（手臂等）靠在某人（某物）上

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French repos (noun), reposer (verb), from late Latin repausare, from re- (expressing intensive force) + pausare 'to pause'
late Middle English (in the sense 'put back in the same position'): from re- 'again' + the verb pose, suggested by Latin reponere 'replace', from re- (expressing intensive force) + ponere 'to place'

entry.def: Repose is a state in which you are resting and feeling calm.

example.ex: He had a still, almost blank face in repose...
example.tran: 他休息时面部平静，几乎毫无表情。

example.ex: Its atmosphere is one of repose rather than excitement.
example.tran: 那里气氛安宁而不热闹。

entry.def: If something reposes somewhere, it is there.

example.ex: Exquisite china soup dishes reposed on silver plates.
example.tran: 银盘子上面摆放着精制的陶瓷汤盘。

means.word_mean: 1. freedom from activity (work or strain or responsibility);

sentences.sentence: "took his repose by the swimming pool"

means.word_mean: 2. the absence of mental stress or anxiety
3. a disposition free from stress or emotion
1. put or confide something in a person or thing;

sentences.sentence: "These philosophers reposed the law in the people"

means.word_mean: 4. lean in a comfortable resting position;

sentences.sentence: "lay the patient carefully onto the bed"

means.word_mean: 6. to put something (eg trust) in something;

sentences.sentence: "The nation reposed its confidence in the King"

auth_sentence.content: He slept the last few hours...in a profound repose.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声
dispose安排+ed……的→任安排的→心甘情愿的
in不+disposed[adj.愿意的,想干的]→adj.不愿意的,身体不适的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 作家, 作曲家, 设计者, 著作者
stems_affixes.word_buile: compose创作+er人→composer作家, 作曲家
pose放→n.姿势,姿态 v.造成,提出,摆姿势,佯装
propose[v.计划, 建议, 向……提议, 求[婚] v.打算, 求婚]+al表名词→n.提议,建议;求婚
pur=per+pose放→始终放着的→目的
re再+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息

stems_affixes.value_cn: 组成,构成;[of]由…组成;创作[诗歌等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: com一起+pose放→放到一起→组成
de下去+pose放→沉淀
dis分开+compose组成,构成→解体
dis分开+pose放→分开排列→安排
ex出+pose放→放出来→暴露
im进+pose放→进去放[强放]→强加
juxta并排+pose放→并排放
op=ob反对+pose放→置于相反地方
pose放→n.姿势,姿态 v.造成,提出,摆姿势,佯装

stems_affixes.value_cn: 计划, 建议, 向……提议, 求[婚]
